title: Scratchpad persistence
description:
Persistent agent memory across iterations.

internal/checkpoint/scratchpad.go:
- Scratchpad struct with file path (.ticker/scratchpad.md)
- Read() string - load current contents
- Append(content string) - add new content with timestamp
- Clear() - reset for new run

Agent can write to scratchpad via file operations.
Ticker reads scratchpad and includes in prompt.

Verify: Content persists across process restarts.
closed_reason: Implemented Scratchpad struct with Read(), Append(), Clear(), Exists() methods. Content persists across process restarts. Comprehensive tests including persistence verification.
notes: 2026-01-11 - Design decision: Use epic notes (tk note) instead of separate scratchpad for iteration context. Scratchpad code implemented but not used - simpler to keep all context in ticks.
